meta.description: Inpsired by the 1.20 announcement of mosaic bamboo, I decided to make a uneque mosaic block for each wood type
meta.long_description:
# Mosaic Carpentry
Inpsired by the 1.20 announcement of mosaic bamboo, I decided to make a uneque mosaic block for each wood type.
![all the blocks as of 1.19.2](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/NSnRfjks/images/8b184b5c9be27fa5a36f228f78fd863d2033ec1e.png)

## The features
 - Mosaic blocks of Oak, Birch, Spruce, Jungle, Accacia, Dark oak, Warped, and Crimson planks.
 - Crafted by placing two slabs on top of eachother, these mosaics can also be crafted into stairs and slabs

### Notes
If you enjoy this mod, you might also enjoy my other mod; [Mosaic Masonry](https://modrinth.com/mod/mosaic-masonry)!

If you encounter any bugs, have any suggestions, or want to talk with another fan of my mods, join my [Discord server](https://discord.gg/VEqBsVaQFy)!

[Here](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mosaic-carpentry) is the version of this mod hosted on Curseforge.
